wiki.summary: Enjoy the Silence is a single by Depeche Mode, written by Martin L. Gore. Produced by Flood & Depeche Mode. Mixed by Daniel Miller & Phil Legg. Released February 1990. Appears on Violator. The song hit #6 in the UK. In the US, it is the band's most successful single, hitting #8 on the Billboard Hot 100 and #1 on the Billboard Modern Rock Tracks chart. Read more on Last.fm.
